  • Classes in com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.common used by com.cloudera.oryx.kmeans.common 
    Class and Description
    Centers
    Represents a collection of Vector instances that act as the centers of a set of clusters, as in a k-means model.
    ClusterValidityStatistics
    Statistics related to the cost and stability of the clusters found during a particular clustering run.
    Distance 
    KMeansEvalStrategy
    Defines a decision rule for choosing which clustering solution(s) to keep based on the performance statistics from a set of clustering runs.
    KMeansInitStrategy
    The strategies used to choose the initial Centers used for a k-means algorithm run prior to running Lloyd's algorithm.
    KMeansUpdateStrategy 
    Weighted
    A typed container for an object and an associated numeric weight.
    WeightedRealVector
